name: Evening Paradise
description:
Evening Paradise is an action/adventure platformer game where you are a battle-axe wielding wizard off to climb the Tower of Correlation. What is at the top?

CONTROLS:

>WASD for basic movement

>Left click to summon a fireball. Left click to send it into the direction you are facing.

>Fireballs can change direction in midair. They are only destroyed by hitting an enemy.

>Fireballs are cleared every ten seconds.

ENEMIES:

DEMON GUARD

>Walks towards you when close

>Speeds up as it runs towards you

>Can jump when running to gain more distance

>Can fly in certain circumstances, they can't really control it that well which makes it easy to attack them

ICE ZOMBIE ARCHER

>Shoots iceballs every second

>Infinite ammo

>Cannot turn

THE DARK KNIGHT

>The final boss

>Runs toward you wherever you are

>Can summon flames from the sky against you

>Tanky

>Can jump
